com.teaminternational.coe.utils.report.zapi

Class ZAPIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teaminternational.coe.utils.report.zapi.ZAPIManager

  • public class ZAPIManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing API calls to Zephyr of JIRA Cloud Have wrapper for Zephyr methods for creating execution, cycle, step, delete execution, cycle, update execution, cycle, step, prepare JSON for any of it's methods, get server information.
    Version:
    1.0 01/10/18
    Author:
    Vladyslav.Yegorov@teaminternational.com

    • Field Detail

      • projectID

        private static java.lang.String projectID
        Project ID in JIRA for ZAPI. Can be found in JIRA Dashboard in the project management "Project Settings" / "Details" in URL parameter pid. Should look like "10000" or "10001", etc. See screenshots in "Overview".

      • versionID

        private static java.lang.String versionID
        Version ID in JIRA for ZAPI. Can be found in JIRA Dashboard in the project management "Project Settings" / "Versions" / click on the created version. Version ID will be in URL after "/versions/". Should look like "10000" or "10001", etc. See screenshots in "Overview".

      • username

        private static java.lang.String username
        Username for authorisation in ZAPI. Can be found in JIRA Dashboard in JIRA Settings / Apps / ZAPI. See screenshots in "Overview".

      • zapiAccessKey

        private static java.lang.String zapiAccessKey
        Access key for authorisation in ZAPI. Can be found in JIRA Dashboard in JIRA Settings / Apps / ZAPI. See screenshots in "Overview".

      • secretKey

        private static java.lang.String secretKey
        Secret key for authorisation in ZAPI. Can be found in JIRA Dashboard in JIRA Settings / Apps / ZAPI. See screenshots in "Overview".

      • zephyrBaseUrl

        private static java.lang.String zephyrBaseUrl
        Base URL for ZAPI calls. It can be found in ZAPI documentation. At the moment it's https://prod-api.zephyr4jiracloud.com/connect

      • ZAPIManager

        public ZAPIManager()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String... args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Body of execution of program from command line. Creates new ZAPIManager instance, get server info from server, creates execution for test with dummy issue id and updates execution with dummy comment and issue id number. Dummy method just for example.
        Parameters:
        args - command line arguments
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of errors

      • prepareJsonForExecution

        public static java.lang.String prepareJsonForExecution(java.lang.String cycleID,
                                                       long issueId,
                                                       boolean pass)
        Creates ObjectNode, define all field required for execution, converts it to string and returns. Also writes it to log.
        Parameters:
        cycleID - ID of cycle
        issueId - ID of issue
        pass - status of test, true - passed
        Returns:
        JSON string for execution

      • prepareJsonForExecutionUpdate

        public static java.lang.String prepareJsonForExecutionUpdate(java.lang.String executionID,
                                                             java.lang.String comment,
                                                             long issueId,
                                                             boolean pass)
        Creates ObjectNode, defines all field required for execution update, converts it to string and returns. Also writes it to log.
        Parameters:
        executionID - ID of execution
        comment - Commentary about update
        issueId - ID of issue
        pass - status of test, true - passed
        Returns:
        JSON string for execution update

      • prepareJsonForStepUpdate

        public static java.lang.String prepareJsonForStepUpdate(long issueId,
                                                        java.lang.String stepId,
                                                        java.lang.String executionID,
                                                        boolean pass)
        Creates ObjectNode, defines all field required for step update, converts it to string and returns. Also writes it to log.
        Parameters:
        issueId - ID of issue
        stepId - ID of step
        executionID - ID of execution
        pass - status of test, true - passed
        Returns:
        JSON string for step update

      • prepareJsonForExecution

        public static java.lang.String prepareJsonForExecution(long issueId,
                                                       boolean pass)
        Calls prepareJsonForExecution with parameter cycleId taken from PropertiesContext singleton and returns returned value
        Parameters:
        issueId - ID of issue
        pass - status of test, true - passed
        Returns:
        JSON string for execution

      • prepareJsonForCycle

        public static java.lang.String prepareJsonForCycle(java.lang.String cycleName)
        Creates ObjectNode, define all field required for cycle creation, converts it to string and returns. Also writes it to log.
        Parameters:
        cycleName - Name of cycle
        Returns:
        JSON string for cycle creation

      • getJWTToken

        private java.lang.String getJWTToken(java.lang.String requestType,
                                     java.lang.String url)
        Get JSON Web Token for defined requestType and URL for 360 seconds
        Parameters:
        requestType - Type of request
        url - URL for token generation
        Returns:
        generated JWT

      • getServerInfo

        public void getServerInfo()
        Get Server (Zephyr for JIRA Cloud) Information. Writes info to log.

      • deleteCycle

        public void deleteCycle(java.lang.String cycleId)
        Send requests to ZAPI for removing cycle. Writes information to log.
        Parameters:
        cycleId - ID of cycle

        Returns:

      • createAttachment

        public java.lang.String createAttachment(long issueId,
                                         java.lang.String entityID,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String filename,
                                         byte[] file)
                                  throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Send requests to ZAPI for creating attachment. Writes information to log.
        Parameters:
        issueId - ID of issue
        entityID - ID of execution
        name - name of file field for uploading
        filename - filename of uploaded file
        file - image in byte's sequence
        Returns:
        Attachment ID or empty string
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - in case of error
